div.span: We believe that elevating where you come home every day is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you choose to live, is where you come alive. APARTMENTS IN PASADENA We welcome you to a highly sophisticated apartment community in the heart of Old Town Pasadena. Discover an amazing series of studio, one- and two-bedroom Pasadena apartments that cater to all your needs. You will be privy to a range of top-of-the-line amenities like natural wood cabinets, private decks, central air conditioning, vaulted ceilings, vinyl wood plank flooring and much more all within the comfort of your own home. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want live, without all the hassle. Here, you can also experience a wealth of fantastic facilities in the community that include an on-site Metro Gold Line stop, a yoga studio, a 24-hour fitness center, a grand public plaza, and a clubhouse. The blend of excellent services and an expert on-site staff makes Avalon Del Mar Station the ideal place to set up a new home. PASADENA APARTMENTS BY AVALON Avalon Del Mar Station brings the best of Pasadena to you. You can walk to trendy Paseo Colorado, boutique shops, popular restaurants and entertainment venues – or enjoy the on-site restaurants and shops right outside these stunning apartment rentals in Old Town Pasadena. With the Metro Gold Line station right at our community, you can easily zip to Downtown Los Angeles, Long Beach or West LA in minutes and kiss your commute goodbye. Enjoy all that Pasadena has to offer when you live at Avalon Del Mar Station. PASADENA APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you choose a new home at our Pasadena apartments, you will also have access to the Avalon Advantage. This superb program provides an impressive collection of advantages to our residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities. You will find it convenient to meet all your demands with Avalon. So don’t even think twice, click the Contact Us or Apply Now buttons below to schedule an appointment with us and discover the best Pasadena apartments in California today!

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Living at Avalon Del Mar Station
div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0f9kiWRGK7y5sV","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe that elevating where you come home every day is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you choose to live, is where you come alive. APARTMENTS IN PASADENA We welcome you to a highly sophisticated apartment community in the heart of Old Town Pasadena. Discover an amazing series of studio, one- and two-bedroom Pasadena apartments that cater to all your needs. You will be privy to a range of top-of-the-line amenities like natural wood cabinets, private decks, central air conditioning, vaulted ceilings, vinyl wood plank flooring and much more all within the comfort of your own home. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want live, without all the hassle. Here, you can also experience a wealth of fantastic facilities in the community that include an on-site Metro Gold Line stop, a yoga studio, a 24-hour fitness center, a grand public plaza, and a clubhouse. The blend of excellent services and an expert on-site staff makes Avalon Del Mar Station the ideal place to set up a new home. PASADENA APARTMENTS BY AVALON Avalon Del Mar Station brings the best of Pasadena to you. You can walk to trendy Paseo Colorado, boutique shops, popular restaurants and entertainment venues – or enjoy the on-site restaurants and shops right outside these stunning apartment rentals in Old Town Pasadena. With the Metro Gold Line station right at our community, you can easily zip to Downtown Los Angeles, Long Beach or West LA in minutes and kiss your commute goodbye. Enjoy all that Pasadena has to offer when you live at Avalon Del Mar Station. PASADENA APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you choose a new home at our Pasadena apartments, you will also have access to the Avalon Advantage. This superb program provides an impressive collection of advantages to our residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities. You will find it convenient to meet all your demands with Avalon.
